2.speaker: B
sentence: This is tom. Is Mr. Robinson available?

3.speaker: A
sentence: Hold on please. He's stepped out for a moment.
잠시만 기다려 주세요. 그는 잠시 나가셨네요 잠깐.

4.speaker: B
sentence: It's so hard to reach to him. He was out of town last time.
연락하기 매우 힘드네요 그에게. 그는 출장주잉었어요 지난번엔.

5.speaker: A
sentence: I'll tell him to call back to you when he gets in.
내가 말할께요 그에게 다시 전화하도록 너에게 그가 사무실에 돌아오면.

6.speaker: B
sentence: It's almost lunch time. Maybe he's out to lunch.
점심시간이 다 되었네요. 아마 그는 점심먹으러 외출했나봐요.
